name: Adventurers' Guild
title: Adventurers' Guild
desc: They boldly venture "up to the stars, down to the abyss," or so their motto would have you believe. In truth, they take on jobs ranging from finding kittens to exploring domains. Well, you cannot afford to gaze at the stars or the abyss without an honest job.

skills.desc:
End Phase: Adventure: Once.
Usage(s): 3
